entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness except mainly cloudy north of Marystown. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
